ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Patch Message
ygData.msgSnippet: Way out of the way of where the majority of 20-31 bards are likely to be (Kunark), and more expensive than the level 32 song.  According to castersrealm, 25pp
ygData.messageBody:
Way out of the way of where the majority of 20-31 bards are likely to be
(Kunark), and more expensive than the level 32 song. According to
castersrealm, 25pp for the lvl 20 one, and 16pp for the level 32 one.

Just to get this stupid thing, I have to either bum a port, buy a port, or
suffer through the agony that is riding the boat from FV to Freeport, not
counting the run from Dalnirs to FV that I'd have to do again...not like I
don't do it enough when I die. Buy a port, both ways, and the potential
cost of this thing is now nearing 70pp. Not to mention the time involved
will pretty much waste the whole evening.

Personally, I'd just wait the 2.1 levels until I get the level 32 song, but
I can hear it now if I don't have it...do I need to say, after the manasong
thread we just had? Bah...

By the way, is it the same as the 32 song, or is it a lesser version?

Atonal "Crankypants" Steelstring
Bah...

-----Original Message-----
From: Kenneth E. Bachman [mailto:kbachman@...]
Sent: Thursday, February 22, 2001 3:10 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Patch Message


All the new spells (I believe), including this song (for sure), can be found
on a vendor in the East Commons tunnel near the
Shady Swashbuckler.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 57 songs, Innoruuk



Poneez01@... wrote:

> Okay, now where do I buy this wonderful new song???
>
> Acelynn Falconsfyre, 26 songs, Bristlebane
